webhooks.list.title: Webhooks
webhooks.list.columns.name: Name
webhooks.list.empty.title: No webhooks configured
webhooks.list.empty.description: Create your first webhook to start receiving event notifications.
webhooks.list.confirmDelete: Delete webhook "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
webhooks.form.subtitle: Configure a webhook to receive event notifications
webhooks.form.sections.eventsDescription: Select the events that will trigger this webhook
webhooks.form.fields.name: Name
webhooks.form.placeholders.name: My Webhook
webhooks.form.placeholders.description: Optional description of what this webhook does...
webhooks.form.hints.timeout: Time to wait for a response (1-60 seconds)
webhooks.form.hints.maxRetries: Number of retry attempts on failure (0-10)
webhooks.form.errors.eventsRequired: At least one event must be selected
webhooks.form.errors.secretMissing: Webhook created but secret was not returned
webhooks.form.delete.title: Delete Webhook
webhooks.form.delete.description: Once deleted, this webhook will stop receiving events immediately.
webhooks.form.delete.confirmDescription: This will permanently delete "{name}" and stop all event deliveries. This action cannot be undone.
webhooks.secret.title: Webhook Created Successfully
webhooks.secret.subtitle: Copy your signing secret now
webhooks.secret.label: Signing Secret
webhooks.secret.warningText: This secret will only be shown once. You'll need it to verify webhook signatures. Store it securely.
webhooks.secret.usageText: Use this secret to verify the webhook-signature header on incoming requests. This ensures the webhook came from Open Mercato.
